phrases: There you go, making that face again,
biting onto your lips.
You are hiding your weak side,
but deep in those eyes,
I can see you cowering.
If you had a true heart,
you would care, cry, call for someone and worry.
Why are you holding onto the pain?
Share some of it with me.
If you do not think it is possible right away,
you can do it slowly, bit by bit.
We do not have wings,
but I am sure we are only finding times that we cannot fly.
I will call for you to the limits of my voice
so that you will not get lost.
Soar up to the sky with your gentle heart,
ride on that wind, and get it all at once.
The human hat is still here.
It is all white and pretty, like snow.
No one will pick you up?
Want to come home with me?
It is so pretty.
I am going to show mom.
Mom...
No, I cannot be crying when I am going to become a man!
From now on, I have to live on my own!
I am going now, Touko-san.
Take care and have fun.
I will.
Takashi.
Yes?
You are going to the hot spring reserve on your study trip, right?
Yes.
Ah, I am sorry for having you pay for the trip.
You do not need to worry about that.
I just have a small favor to ask of you.
There is a pottery in the mountains near the hot springs,
so could you pick up some tea cups for me?
I received a call saying that they were almost done.
Could I ask you to do this?
Of course, Shigeru-san.
What a weird laugh, Natsume.
Sensei, when did you get in?
Is not it natural for your bodyguard to follow you?
That is true, but...
So, what are you so happy about?
It feels good to be asked to do a favor for someone else.
Great people will eventually meet their ruin,
much like dust before the wind.
All right, let us end the morning class here.
You have free time until lunch.
All right!
What should we do?
We have got to go to the hot spring first!
Right, Natsume?
Sorry, I have some business to take care of.
Oh, really?
Ah, I am sure it is in this area.
Ah, over there.
Hey, you weak little fox!
You are still hanging around the forest?
You are an eyesore, you useless brat!
Leave the forest, you useless brat!
Useless brat?
Leave!
Stop!
W-Who is he?
What are you doing bullying this little child?
Are you a human child?
How dare a human child look down on us!
How impetuous!
I will kill you!
Oh well.
You are a real busybody as always, Natsume.
It could not be helped.
Still, what a waste of time.
We have to come back again.
It cannot be helped, the tea cups will not be finished baking until tomorrow.
Humans are such troublesome creatures.
They go so far just for a container for food,
yet they could just buy it at the local super market.
You are being brutally frank saying that.
A body is not a container, though.
What are you talking about?
I hate humans,
but...
Natsume, it is going your way!
All right, all right!
Nice!
Natsume, do not sleep.
Natsume...
It bounced off you and hit me earlier.
Sorry, sorry.
I wonder what dinner will be, right, Natsume?
Yeah, I am looking forward to it.
Natsume laughs often,
but it seems kind of fake.
His words, his gestures, his aura,
they all seem kind of fake.
Maybe he is not really a human.
Maybe he is like me and is disguised as a human.
Maybe he is lonely like me.
He should live in the forest with me, then!
Right, mom?
Damn, I am going back tomorrow,
and I would feel bad if it got attached to me.
It is too late.
Shut up, sensei.
This is the worst.
We cannot go get the tea cups now.
Who knows if we can even make it back to class now.
Natsume-dono.
Am I just hearing things?
Thank you.
Mom, I am useful now.
He said Thank you to me.
I am not useless anymore, right?
I will go gather mushrooms tomorrow.
I will gather a lot and share some with Natsume!
Oh, you are still here, you little fox?
He just does not learn.
We told you to get lost!
We do not need any useless brats in this forest!
You are wrong!
I am not useless anymore!
Damn it!
I will kill you, you little brat!
I told you to stop!
Damn him!
The one from yesterday!
Were my fists not enough for you?
Natsume-dono...
Natsume-dono!
Who is it?
Have you forgotten, Natsume Reiko-dono?
You said you would come and return my name in the spring.
Damn Reiko, she is as cruel as always.
Spring?
How many springs have passed already?
You are the one who called me?
Sensei, take care of the tea cups.
Take it, Sawarabi.
It is your name.
Eh, Natsume?!
The owner of the Book of Friends?
Thank you for returning it.
The Book of Friends?
I have heard of it.
When they have their names written in it, it serves as a contract and they are then bound to the owner.
He will take our names!
Run away!
What are they saying?
There is no way he would take your names when he just returned one.
My name is written on it.
Please make me your follower!
I am sure I will be useful to you!
I do not need it.
Is it because I am weak?
Is it because I will not be useful?
I do not want us to be bound like this.
We are not master and follower.
Right?
I think we have a different relationship.
My, what a wonderful color.
I am going to change.
The townsfolk introduced me to a good pottery.
Our family has grown, so I thought this was a good chance.
This is yours, Takashi.
Thank you.
It is just like that little fox said.
About what, Natsume?
It is not about whether you are useful or useless.
I do not get it at all.
It really is pretty!
I want to show it to Natsume too.
Natsume...
I want to see Natsume.
I cannot be crying when I am going to become a man!
I have already decided to become strong and to be helpful to Natsume!
Do you want to see Natsume that much?
I have heard the rumors.
You met the owner of the Book of Friends, Natsume, did not you?
You still cannot disguise yourself as a human?
If you can fill me up with fish, then I will tell you a way to see Natsume.
Will you tell me how to see Natsume now?
What a foolish little fox.
You were tricked.
You are always alone because you are so stupid.
Natsume already forgot about you a long time ago.
Take this, little fox.
It is medicine that will allow you to become a human for one day.
Medicine to become a human?
If you want to see him, you can go see him yourself.
That is all there is to it.
That is right, I just have to go see him!
All right, I am a fox too!
Once I go to the world of humans, I can follow Natsume's scent!
I will be going now, mom.
I wonder if Natsume is feeling lonely being by himself.
Natsume's scent?
Natsume...
It is Natsume's scent.
I want to see him!
Hey, hey!
Watch where you are going!
Where is Natsume?
Natsume?
Oh, are you okay by yourself?
Where is your mother?
I am fine by myself.
I want to see him.
I want to see him!
Where is he?
Where is Natsume?
Natsume!
There it is!
Pull it in!
Pull it in!
It is huge!
You again, Natsume?
You caught a whole bunch.
Sorry.
What are you eating?
It is Natsume's scent!
He is nearby!
I can see him!
It is all fried!
It is the landlocked masu salmon Natsume caught!
Well, well, what a fine salmon you caught!
Let us eat, Takashi.
Okay.
Yours has the skin, Takashi, so is that okay?
Yes, it is fine with me.
If you do not like anything, tell me, okay?
Shigure-san does not like green peppers.
He is like a kid, right?
The truth is, when I was young, I did not like them either.
I see, so I have got a friend here too!
Here.
Let us see.
Well, this salmon is pretty good, Touko-san.
Then maybe I will have some too.
Go ahead.
How is it?
It is good!
That is great, Natsume looked like he was having fun!
He was not lonely!
I was the lonely one.
Wait!
So,
it was the little fox from before.
Thank you.
You came to see me, right?
You have got a cute hat.
Let us go have dinner and then I will take you home.
I have to remember the way.
I will go see you next time.
Okay!
You are a good kid.
When I was lonely, I was afraid of going out.
I did not even think of doing something about it.
So,
I probably did not notice many things.
On that day where the sky was ablaze,
and rays of light were piercing through,
the evening rain had stopped,
I noticed the scent of summer.
Among the crowded, shining lights,
I turned my ear to my thoughts,
and I could hear traces of my dear friends.
The summer evening sky
and the vivid passing days were just the same,
and so I laughed; it was just like
my memory of that summer.
That person could see Youkai.
They exchanged their feelings and became important to each other.
But one day...
He cannot see Ayakashi anymore?
If he is happy, then I do not mind.
Are you sure,
Kio?
